title: On Holidays Like This....
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Hey, Honoka-chan. Look. It looks like a new bakery has opened up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let me see.... Oooh, seems delicious~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Do you want to go there now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm.... I think I’ll pass for today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Are you sure?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah! Today I just want to talk with you while relaxing and lazing around, Kotori-chan. But of course I’ll go with you if you’re interested in that Bakery.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Honoka-chan....! I also feel like talking with you all day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Really!? Then, let’s talk a whole bunch today~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu. It feels good to just laze around, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It’s the best~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
